name: YANewsflash
author: stratosg

sections.description:
YANewsflash (Yet Another Newsflash) plugin helps you create newsflashes in the easiest way possible! Just enter the text (HTML also allowed), the duration you want it displayed, if you want it to show up on your homepage and how many times a visitor must see it (0 for infinite) and you are set! It will be displayed in a box that you can also style easily through the admin!

Requirements

None what so ever…

Contact

Suggestion, fixes, rants, congratulations, gifts etc to stratosg@stratosector.net
Also visit the plugin’s page at http://www.stratos.me/wp-plugins/yanewsflash/
sections.installation: Activate like any plugin. Just copy the yanewsflash.php file in the plugins directory and activate. Then, visit the configuration page on the admin under Settings -> YANewsflash
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed an issue with quotes

1.0.2

  • Fixed problem showing newsflash multiple times

1.0.3

  • Fixed a problem that messed up with the feed
